title: From Comeback Kuss to the Wild West Women’s WorldTour: These Are the 12 Juiciest Narratives to Follow in 2025
content:
Can Kuss kick back after an off-key '24? Will Vollering vanquish SD Worx? Can Pogačar possibly get better? Here's what we're watching for in 2025.

Read the full article at From Comeback Kuss to the Wild West Women’s WorldTour: These Are the 12 Juiciest Narratives to Follow in 2025 on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
